Description_lang: The crystal reacts when struck, encasing the attacker in a shell that absorbs incoming damage and healing. Initially the shell can absorb up to $137633s2% of max health in damage, but healing absorbed by the shell is added to this total, up to a cap of $137648s2% of max health. The shell breaks when it cannot absorb any more damage.
AuraDescription_lang: Reacts when struck, encasing the attacker in a shell that absorbs incoming damage and healing. Initially the shell can absorb up to $137633s2% of max health in damage, but healing absorbed by the shell is added to this total, up to a cap of $137648s2% of max health. The shell breaks when it cannot absorb any more damage.
